verses.roman:
hiraṇya, govardhana--dui mulukera majumadāra
tāra purohita--'balarāma' nāma tāṅra

synonyms: hiraṇya—Hiraṇya; govardhana—Govardhana; dui—two; mulukera—of that country; majumadāra—treasurers of the government; tāra—their; purohita—priest; balarāma—Balarāma; nāma—name; tāṅra—his.
translation: Hiraṇya and Govardhana were the two governmental treasurers in that division of the country. Their priest was named Balarāma Ācārya.

purport.content: The word majumadāra refers to a treasurer who keeps accounts of revenue.
